text: Had several issues with the Lenovo LEGION Y520 Gaming and Business Laptop (Intel i7-7700HQ Quad Core, 16GB RAM, 512GB PCIe SSD, 15.6" Full HD (1920 x 1080), GeForce GTX 1060 6GB, Backlit Keyboard, Win 10 Home) since day one. Wi-Fi drops intermittently and the keyboard feels cheap. Performance in streaming games is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Avoid the Lenovo LEGION Y520 Gaming and Business Laptop (Intel i7-7700HQ Quad Core, 16GB RAM, 512GB PCIe SSD, 15.6" Full HD (1920 x 1080), GeForce GTX 1060 6GB, Backlit Keyboard, Win 10 Home) if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. Fans get extremely loud, like a jet engine.. Looking to return it.
